name: NIRA
body:
NIRA solves coupled-constraint games. It implements an equilibrium search method based on the Nikaido-Isoda function and a relaxation algorithm, hence the acronym NIRA. This version of NIRA includes a graphical user interface which allows the user to specify the game symbolically.

## Version
The latest version is [1.1] (https://github.com/wilbur-t/nira/releases/tag/1.1). Earlier versions were developed before NIRA was migrated to GitHub, they are available [here] (https://drive.google.com/folderview?id=0B39JLTTdR-V8c0hSdUNVVmprM2M&usp=drive_web).

## Requirements
NIRA runs through MATLAB, and makes use of the Optimization and Symbolic Math toolboxes. It is tested on MATLAB 2013b.

## Manual

The NIRA manual is available [here](https://drive.google.com/file/d/0Bx37Z6Mlfz5QRHp0TDc0Qzhsekk/edit?usp=sharing).

## Acknowledgement

The authors gratefully thank Victoria University of Wellington for support in creation and maintenance.
